014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.config.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
018import java.lang.invoke.MethodType;
019import java.lang.reflect.Method;
020import java.util.Arrays;
021import java.util.Objects;
022import java.util.function.Supplier;
023import java.util.stream.Stream;
024
025import javax.annotation.Nullable;
026
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Sneaky;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.SqlStatements;
030import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.TemplateEngine;
031import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.config.Configurer;
032import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.config.UseTemplateEngine;
033
034public class UseTemplateEngineImpl implements Configurer {
035    @Override
036    public void configureForMethod(ConfigRegistry registry, Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType, @Nullable Method method) {
037        UseTemplateEngine anno = (UseTemplateEngine) annotation;
038        TemplateEngine templateEngine = instantiate(anno.value(), sqlObjectType, method);
039        registry.get(SqlStatements.class).setTemplateEngine(templateEngine);
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public void configureForType(ConfigRegistry registry, Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType) {
044        configureForMethod(registry, annotation, sqlObjectType, null);
045    }
046
047    private static TemplateEngine instantiate(Class<? extends TemplateEngine> engineClass, Class<?> sqlObjectType, @Nullable Method method) {
048        return Stream.of(tryConstructor(engineClass), tryConstructor(engineClass, sqlObjectType), tryConstructor(engineClass, sqlObjectType, method))
049            .map(Supplier::get)
050            .filter(Objects::nonNull)
051            .findFirst()
052            .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("Unable to instantiate, no viable constructor for " + engineClass.getName()));
053    }
054
055    private static <T extends TemplateEngine> Supplier<T> tryConstructor(Class<T> clazz, Object... args) {
056        return () -> {
057            try {
058                Object[] nonNullArgs = Arrays.stream(args).filter(Objects::nonNull).toArray(Object[]::new);
059                Class[] argClasses = Arrays.stream(nonNullArgs).map(Object::getClass).toArray(Class[]::new);
060                MethodType type = MethodType.methodType(void.class, argClasses);
061                return (T) MethodHandles.lookup().findConstructor(clazz, type).invokeWithArguments(nonNullArgs);
062            } catch (NoSuchMethodException ignored) {
063                return null;
064            } catch (Throwable t) {
065                throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(t);
066            }
067        };
068    }
069}
